forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The evening in downtown San Francisco unfolds beneath a canopy of mostly clear skies. As the city settles into a tranquil night, expect the temperature to dip to a crisp 45 degrees, accompanied by a gentle north-northwest wind whispering at just around 6 mph. There’s an inviting clarity to the atmosphere, free from the typical embrace of fog, allowing the twinkling city lights to create a radiant tapestry against the darkening sky. 

Tomorrow promises a sunlit awakening, with temperatures nudging close to 60 during the day before gently retreating to around 58 in the afternoon. A northwest breeze will offer a refreshing touch, ensuring that the day's warmth is complemented by a soft, cooling element. Optimal attire calls for layers; a light sweater or jacket will suffice for the cooler moments, particularly in the morning. Given the pleasant conditions, a stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet afternoon spent at a cozy café would be most rewarding, inviting moments of simple enjoyment amidst the beauty of the day.
